title: Orphan File Removal Policy
description: Inheritable Polaris policy schema for Iceberg table orphan file removal.

enable.description: Enable or disable orphan file removal.

older_than.description: A Unix timestamp. Remove orphan files created before this timestamp.

location.description: Customized directory other than table location to look for files in.

config.description: A map containing custom configuration properties. Please note that interoperability is not guaranteed.
